basic.Peptide Name: RcAlb-PepI (designed in silico using as template the amino acid sequence of Rc-2S-Alb)
basic.Source: Synthetic construct (Rc-2S-Alb comes from Ricinus communis (Castor bean))
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.31678367] Gram-negative bacteria:E. coli (MIC50 = 102 μM, MIC90 >  250 μM, MBC > 250 μM), K. pneumoniae(MIC50 = 121 μM, MIC90 > 250 μM, MBC > 250 μM)Gram-positive bacteria:S. aureus (MIC50 = 123 μM, MIC90 > 250 μM, MBC > 250 μM)Yeast:C. albicans (MIC50 = 62 μM, MIC90 > 250 μM, MFC > 250 μM), C. parapsilosis (MIC50 = 14 μM, MIC90 = 32 μM, MFC = 103 μM), C. tropicalis (MIC50 = 21 μM, MIC90 = 38 μM, MFC = 127 μM)
